body_html: It could be interesting to add something about extension of net archs without scratch retraining if there are plans to introduce Net2Net in Tensorflow. There is already an initial Torch implementation.
body_text: It could be interesting to add something about extension of net archs without scratch retraining if there are plans to introduce Net2Net in Tensorflow. There is already an initial Torch implementation.
body: It could be interesting to add something about extension of net archs without scratch retraining if there are plans to introduce [Net2Net](http://arxiv.org/abs/1511.05641) in Tensorflow. There is already an [initial Torch implementation](https://github.com/soumith/net2net.torch).
